data.description: Data AI InternLocation: Palo Alto, CA As a Data AI Intern at Intapp, you will become a part of our internal Data Solutions AI team committed to helping our employees provide AI-powered solutions to hundreds of the largest professional and financial service firms worldwide.  We are looking for extraordinary students with a passion for technology, a love to help people, and a desire to experience participating with a great team of IT professionals.  So if you’re ready to learn how to be a key team member dedicated to delivering both technical and highly innovative results, Intapp is the place for you! What you’ll do: Works on preparing, analyzing, and managing datasets to train and evaluate large language models.The role involves experimenting with prompts, fine-tuning models, and assessing LLM performance using quantitative and qualitative metrics.Collaborate with Data Engineers, integrations team integrate LLMs and agentic use cases into applications and workflows.What you will need:Programming and Data: Strong knowledge of Python, SQL, PandasLLM and AI knowledge: understanding of language models, prompt engineering, model evaluationStrong communication and interpersonal skills.What to Expect:  Our Summer 2026 Internship Program begins June 1, 2026, and is projected to end August 7, 2026.  Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.  Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities. Please visit Intapp Summer Internship to hear from our former interns about their internship experiences and check out Working at Intapp to learn more about what we value and why Intapp is a wonderful place to start your career! Intapp provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and will make hiring decisions without regard to race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin or ancestry, age, disability, marital status, pregnancy, protected veteran status, protected genetic information, political affiliation, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. Please note: Intapp will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone. We will never extend a job offer unless you have been contacted directly by an Intapp recruiter and have participated in the interview process which will generally consist of 3 or more virtual or in person meetings. Please note that Intapp only uses company email addresses, which contain “@intapp.com” or “@dealcloud.com” to communicate with candidates via email. Intapp will never ask for financial information of any kind or for any payment during the job application process. We post all legitimate job openings on the Intapp Career Site at https://www.intapp.com/working-at-intapp/. If you believe you were a victim of such a scam, you may contact your local authorities. Intapp is not responsible for any claims, losses, damages, or expenses resulting from scammers.
responsibilities: Collaborate with Data Engineers, integrations team integrate LLMs and agentic use cases into applications and workflows.

Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.
Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities.
